meanings.definition: Absolute in the highest degree; most extreme.
meanings.sent1: The absolutest joy filled her heart when she saw her family after a long time.
meanings.sent2: It was the absolutest storm they had ever experienced, with thunder and lightning all around.
meanings.sent3: The absolutest surprise awaited him as he opened the door to find a puppy inside.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him was the absolutest, like an unbreakable bond that tied their hearts together.
meanings.sent5: The absolutest beauty of the sunset painted the sky in hues of orange and pink.

meanings.sent1: He had the absolutest freedom to choose his own path in life.
meanings.sent2: The absolutest silence enveloped the room, not a sound could be heard.
meanings.sent3: She felt the absolutest relief when she finally finished her exams.
meanings.sent4: The absolutest darkness of the night hid all the stars from view.
meanings.sent5: The absolutest control over the situation gave him confidence in his decisions.

meanings.sent1: Their friendship was the absolutest, with unwavering support for each other.
meanings.sent2: The absolutest trust existed between the two partners in the business.
meanings.sent3: He offered his absolutest apology for the mistake he had made.
meanings.sent4: The absolutest loyalty of the dog never wavered, no matter what happened.
meanings.sent5: Her smile conveyed the absolutest happiness, lighting up the room with joy.
